column3: Verify login with valid email and password
column4: Check that a registered user can log in using a valid email and correct password and is redirected to the homepage.
Check that entering a valid email and an invalid password shows an appropriate error message

column3: Verify login with unregester email and password
column4: Check that entering an unregistered email with any password shows an error message indicating the account does not exist.”

column3: Verify login with empty email and/or password fields
column4: Leave email and/or password blank and click Login; verify validation messages appear asking to fill required fields.
Click “Forgot Password” link from login page and verify user is navigated to the password recovery page and receives reset instructions.

column3: Verify search with a valid product name
column4: Enter a valid product name (e.g., samsung s24) and verify product results are displayed.

column3: Verify search with an invalid product
column4: Enter an invalid keyword and verify Amazon shows “No results found” or similar suggestions.

column3: Verify adding a product to the cart
column4: Select a product and click “Add to Cart”; verify item is added successfully.
Change item quantity (1 → 2 or 2 → 1) and verify cart updates price and quantity correctly.

column3: Verify removing a product from cart
column4: Remove an item from cart and verify the cart gets updated.
Ensure item price × quantity = total price; including delivery charges if applicable.

column3: Verify user cannot checkout without login
column4: Try checkout without logging in; verify user is asked to sign in first.
